casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Matthew Scott KRAUSE 348P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Matthew Scott Krause, for Krause, Matthew Scott.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of October 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
